word:
To the youth of today, as surely as to Timothy, are spoken the words, "Study to show thyself approved 
                                                                           68
unto God, a workman that needeth not to be ashamed, rightly dividing the word of truth." "Flee also youthful lusts: but follow righteousness, faith, charity, peace." "Be thou an example of the believers, in word, in conversation, in charity, in spirit, in faith, in purity." [2 Timothy 2:15, 22; 1 Timothy 4:12.]
